title: Game just disappeared?
body:
So I was in a game, about 15 minutes in or so I don't remember exactly, when suddenly I got a failed to reconnect prompt. My internet was working fine, and after waiting for 1-2 minutes or so I exited out of the client and relogged in, and when I got back the game was just gone. I couldn't rejoin it and it's not in my match history, and I was allowed to requeue for ranked instantly.

What happened here?

replies.body: Ahhhh that's a rather rare occurrence when the entire game crashed on the server side. A good sign for when that happens is that you won't ever have to option to try reconnecting to the match since it doesn't exist anymore. You shouldn't have gotten any penalties, and you're free to continue onto your next match!
